amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to support the National Health Service Corps.

vote.text: Amendment SA 970 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 970 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S4270-4272; text: CR S4271) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to support the National Health Service Corps.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 970 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 970 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Hatch.
